name: Trio
description: This animation was a study for ‘2 in neon’ (https://hansup.be/2007_2-in-neon_group-exhibition_hans-verhaegen.html) a proposal of the integration of a work of art at Netwerk, centre for contemporary art, Aalst, Belgium.  2007 CR 551 https://hansup.be/2007_trio_animation_hans-verhaegen.html
